content.rendered:
Darren has broad expertise in marine surveying and insurance, risk management and assessment, marine investigations and loss control auditing, international best practices and standards, marine asset valuations of commercial vessels, warranty surveying, project management, technical reporting, owner / buyer representative, litigation support, and business development.

Contact

Houston, TX | +1 713 292 3205

Discipline: Mariner
Specialism: H&M Surveys
Expert Witness Expertise: Appraisal consulting services
